name: test
description: Full Stack App - React + Vite + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS + Django + DRF

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:micro
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate
scripts.setup:micro: cd micro-challenges-node && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend && set CI=true && npm test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:micro && npm run test:frontend
